mapper.select: SELECT contract_price_code, member_id, contract_price_money, contract_price_etc, contract_price_date FROM contract_price
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract_price ( contract_price_code, member_id, contract_price_money, contract_price_etc, contract_price_date ) VALUES ( #{contract_price_code}, #{member_id}, #{contract_price_money}, #{contract_price_etc}, NOW() )
